original_text: Thou shalt fear the Lord thy God, and serve him, and shalt swear by his name.
korean_text: 네 하나님 여호와를 경외하며 그를 섬기며 그의 이름으로 맹세할 것이니라

sentences.original_text: Thou shalt fear the Lord thy God
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 네 하나님 여호와를 경외할 것이요

sentences.original_text: and shalt swear by his name
